name: rishiqing-electron
author: 北京创仕科锐信息技术有限责任公司
CompanyName: 北京创仕科锐信息技术有限责任公司

scripts.build-beta: grunt --env=beta && cross-env CHANNEL=beta ARCH=x64 node electron-builder.js
scripts.build-release: grunt --env=release && cross-env CHANNEL=release ARCH=x64 node electron-builder.js
scripts.build-ia32-beta: grunt --env=beta && cross-env CHANNEL=beta ARCH=ia32 node electron-builder.js
scripts.build-ia32-release: grunt --env=release && cross-env CHANNEL=release ARCH=ia32 node electron-builder.js
scripts.build-x64-beta: grunt --env=beta && cross-env CHANNEL=beta ARCH=x64 node electron-builder.js
scripts.build-x64-release: grunt --env=release && cross-env CHANNEL=release ARCH=x64 node electron-builder.js
scripts.package-mac: npm run package-mac-beta && npm run package-mac-release
scripts.package-mac-beta: grunt --env=beta --platform=darwin && cd dir && npm i -d && cd .. && node ./package.js --env=beta --arch=x64 --platform=darwin && node ./dmg.js --env=beta
scripts.package-mac-release: grunt --env=release --platform=darwin && cd dir && npm i -d && cd .. && node ./package.js --env=release --arch=x64 --platform=darwin && node ./dmg.js --env=release
scripts.package-win32-x64-beta: grunt --env=beta --platform=win32 && cd dir && npm i -d && cd .. && node ./package.js --env=beta --arch=x64 --platform=win32
scripts.package-win32-x64-release: grunt --env=release --platform=win32 && cd dir && npm i -d && cd .. && node ./package.js --env=release --arch=x64 --platform=win32
scripts.package-win32-ia32-beta: grunt --env=beta --platform=win32 && cd dir && npm i -d && cd .. && node ./package.js --env=beta --arch=ia32 --platform=win32
scripts.package-win32-ia32-release: grunt --env=release --platform=win32 && cd dir && npm i -d && cd .. && node ./package.js --env=release --arch=ia32 --platform=win32
